channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat -- RHOL-5.5-RHEL-8
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat -- RHOL-5.5-RHEL-8

item.title: CVE-2023-4456|2024-08-20T15:22:18.198Z -- red%20hat -- rhol-5.5-rhel-8
item.description: A flaw was found in openshift-logging LokiStack. The key used for caching is just the token, which is too broad. This issue allows a user with a token valid for one action to execute other actions as long as the authorization allowing the original action is still cached.
